content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=35-41, y=-83 to -87)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-86.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- Wooden chests collecting coal at positions (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5), (40.5,-87.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5) transferring coal between components

### Iron/Copper Ore Processing at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Mining and smelting setup with:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) extracting iron and copper ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0) for smelting
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) storing ore
- Burner inserters at (-26.5,-59.5), (-25.5,-58.5) moving materials
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) storing plates

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Large mining setup with:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components
- Burner inserters managing material flow

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Large smelting setup consisting of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters managing input/output

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17.5 to 27.5)
Complete power setup with:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric poles distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting from empty/non-existent sources
- Verify the target chest/container has the requested items before attempting extraction
- Check if the chest exists at the specified location

### Errors with inserter placement and operation
- Ensure inserters have proper input and output positions defined
- Keep inserters fueled to maintain operation
- Clear blocked output positions to allow inserter operation

### Fluid system connection errors
- Ensure all fluid-carrying entities (pipes, boilers, engines) are properly connected
- Maintain continuous pipe connections between water source and consumers

### Belt system blockages
- Clear full output chests to prevent belt system backups
- Ensure belts have valid input and output connections
- Monitor belt capacity to prevent overflow
